sols.text: Sure! It's a picture of my family.
No, this is my grandfather! And this is my grandmother.
They do! And these are my aunt and uncle.
Cool! And who is this one?
هذا أخي الصغير. لدي أخت أيضًا.
This is my little brother. I have a sister, too.
Yes, she's here, next to my parents.
And what do your parents do?
